!openssl-certificate host="192.168.1.125" path="/etc/ssl/crt/ansible.com.crt" privatekey_path="/etc/ssl/private/ansible.com.pem" csr_path="/etc/ssl/csr/www.ansible.com.csr" provider="selfsigned"
